mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Cox, Richard A.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Monongahalia Co. VA [Monongalia County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Cox, Richard A. Patient Age: 29. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture left arm: ball entering [anteriorly] the deltoid muscle two inches below neck of humerus ball lodged and not found. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Discharged from service.
